gurmukhi: rihE nwd pUrM ] CuhI gYix DUrM ]6]128]
transliteration: Rahio Naad Pooran|| Chhouboo Gadn(i) Dhooran||6||128||
translation: Its sound is filling the atmosphere. The sky is filled with the dust risen from the battlefield.6.128.

gurmukhi: sBY ssqR swjy ] GxM jym gwjy ]
transliteration: Sabhai Sastra Saaje|| Ghanan Jem Gadje||
translation: The warriors have bedecked themselves with weapons and are thundering like clouds.

gurmukhi: cly qyj qY kY ] AnMq ssqR lY kY ]7]129]
transliteration: Chale Tej Tai Kai|| Anant Sastra Lai Kai||7||129||
translation: They are furiously moving, carrying countless weapons.7.129.

gurmukhi: chUM Er FUky ] muKM mwr kUky ]
translation: From all four sides the warriors are closing their ranks, shouting “kill, kill”.

gurmukhi: AnMq ssqR b`jy ] mhwN bIr g`jy ]8]130]
transliteration: Anant Sastra Bajje|| Mahaan Boor Gadje||8||130||
translation: The mighty warriors are thundering and countless weapons are striking blows.8.130.

gurmukhi: muKM nYx rkqM ] Dry pwx skqM ]
translation: Carrying the powerful weapons in their hands, their faces and eyes are becoming blood-red.

gurmukhi: kIey kRoD au`Ty ] srM biRsit bu`Ty ]9]131]
transliteration: Kie Krodh Outthe|| Saran Bristtee Boutthe||9||131||
translation: In great fury, they are marching and showering their arrows.9.131.

gurmukhi: ikqy dust kUty ] AnMq AsqR CUty ]
transliteration: Kite Doust Koote|| Anant Astra Chhodhte||
translation: Many of the tyrants have been killed and consequently countless weapons are lying scattered hither and thither.

gurmukhi: krI bwx brKM ] BrI dyib hrKM ]10]132]
transliteration: Daroo Baan Barkhan|| Bdaroo Deb(i) Harkhan||10||132||
translation: The goddess hath been pleased and is showering her arrows.10.132.

gurmukhi: kh kh su kUkq kMkIXM ] bih bhq bIr su bMkIXM ]
transliteration: Kah Kah Su Kookat Kankoohan|| Bah(i) Bahat Boor Su Bankooyan||
translation: The crows are uttering “caw, caw” and the blood of mighty heroes is flowing.

gurmukhi: lh lhq bwix kiRpwxXM ] gh ghq pRyq mswxXM ]11]133]
transliteration: Lah Lahat Baan(i) Kridaanayan|| Gad Gadat Prêt Masaanayan||11||133||
translation: The arrows and swords are waving in the wind and the ghosts and evil spirits are catching the dead.11.133.

gurmukhi: fh fhq fbr fmMkXM ] lh lhq qyg qRmMkXM ]
transliteration: Dah Dahat Dabar Damanndayan|| Lah Lahat Teg Tramanndayan||
translation: The tobors are resounding and the swords are glistening.

gurmukhi: DRm DRmq swNg DmMkXM ] bbkMq bIr su bMkXM ]12]134]
transliteration: Dhram Dhramat Saan Dharamanndayan|| Babkant Boor Su Bankayan||12||134||
translation: The sounds of striking daggers and the thundering of the warriors are being heard.12.134.
